author: James Van Straten
title: The Blockchain Group Bolsters Bitcoin Holdings and Capital Base
description: Europe’s first bitcoin treasury company reports soaring BTC gains and strategic share subscriptions.
content:
The Blockchain Group (ALTBG) announced a series of strategic moves enhancing both its bitcoin treasury 
 and capital structure. The Paris-based company bought 60 BTC for about 5.5 million euros ($6.… [+921 chars]
